Detailed Description

Data common to any item stored in memcached.

Examples:

default_engine.c.

Member Data Documentation

rel_time_t item::exptime

When the item will expire (relative to process startup).

uint32_t item::flags

Flags associated with the item.

uint16_t item::iflag

Intermal flags.

lower 8 bit is reserved for the core server, the upper 8 bits is reserved for engine implementation.

uint32_t item::nbytes

The total size of the data (in bytes).

uint16_t item::nkey

The total length of the key (in bytes).
